text: Charlbi Dean Kriek ( ; 5 February 1990 â€“ 29 August 2022) was a South African actress and model. She was best known for her roles in the Spud movies, Black Lightning television series and the 2022 movie Triangle of Sadness. Dean died on 29 August 2022 from sepsis at a hospital in New York City at the age of 32. ==References== Category:1990 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from sepsis Category:South African models Category:South African actors Category:People from Cape Town
title: Charlbi Dean
